CreateSDKLoginToken.title: 创建 SDK 登录 Token

CreateStaff.input:
https://ccc.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreateStaff
&SdkAppId=1400000000
&Staffs.0.Phone=联系电话
&Staffs.0.Mail=联系人邮箱
&<公共请求参数>
CreateStaff.title: 创建客服示例

DescribeChatMessages.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeChatMessages
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CdrId": "xx", 
    "InstanceId": 0
}
DescribeChatMessages.title: 查询聊天记录示例

DescribeIMCdrs.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeIMCdrs
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": 12, 
    "StartTimestamp": 1603877878,
    "EndTimestamp": 1603877879
}
DescribeIMCdrs.title: 查询在线客服记录示例
